name: Apache HTTP Server full deployment on a single VM - VMware vSphere
description: This template deploys Apache HTTP Server with a full configuration on a single Linux node. The template includes virtual host configuration and enables SSL support.

metadata.displayName: Apache HTTP Server full deployment on a single VM
metadata.longDescription: This template deploys Apache HTTP Server with a full configuration on a single Linux node. The template includes virtual host configuration and enables SSL support.

bullets.title: Operating Systems Supported
bullets.description:
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6
Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
Ubuntu 14.04 LTS

bullets.title: Topology
bullets.description:
1 virtual machine:
httpd service instance with SSL enabled

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. The user is responsible for obtaining the appropriate software licenses and downloads prior to template deployment.
2. Detailed system requirements for Apache HTTP Server - http://httpd.apache.org/
